column1: STAT_PIETY_DESC_GK_REASON;Reason is respected by other non-religious people. Like Prestige
column2: it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: atheism_DESC;Universalism is the lack of belief in any gods. It is not a religion
column2: but it is often wrongly treated as one. Universalists still have moral codes
column3: including a sense of right and wrong. Those codes often come from an inner sense of compassion for their fellow human beings.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: atheism_reformed_DESC;Universalism is the lack of belief in any gods. It is not a religion
column2: but it is often wrongly treated as one. Universalists still have moral codes
column3: including a sense of right and wrong. Those codes often come from an inner sense of compassion for their fellow human beings. To fight back religious persecution
column4: a group of Universalists decided to form a permanent organization called Comintern.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PDD_government_desc;People's Democratic Dictatorship functions the same way as a standard feudal government
column2: except that cities can be held without penalty
column3: and building temples is impossible. Meanwhile, revoking feudal titles whose owner follows other religions is free. ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: secular_liberation_desc;Universalist rulers can liberate territory from religious ones. Nearby religious rulers will likely join in to help the defender. This war is much like a holy war. If the target abandons religion

atheism_holy_war_desc;Universalist rulers can liberate territory from religious ones. Nearby religious rulers will likely join in to help the defender. This war is much like a holy war. If the target abandons religion
atheism_great_crusade_desc;Atheists all around the world are organized and well-prepared under Comintern now. Liberate people from religious poisoning! Universalists of the world
column2: unite! Conquered lands will be distributed to claimants and those who contributed most to the war
column3: much like a crusade. If the target abandons religion
